page.title: 09Traffic problems in Perth
page.content: The two Perth Bridges prove quite a{ Bottle neck for traffic from the North and South passing through Perth. Local traffic causes Great Problems in the morning and teatime rush hours. Thursdays,Fridays & Saturdays are{ especially busy with country folk coming to town to shop. Special events such as the Perth Agricultural Show in July & The Scone Horse Races cause traffic problems as do public holidays in other towns like Dundee,Aberdeen,Glasgow & Edinburgh. English & Foreign holiday traffic build up mainly in the months of August & September. The new Friarton Bridge,which is down river has helped a bit,but many people still prefer to come into the town. Perth is such a Beautiful city that traffic problems do not deter people from visiting!
